info.game_comments: 3rd regular play game in 14 seasons that didn't have a winner.

(2, 1).clue: The famous greeting "Dr. Livingstone, I presume?" is attributed to him

(3, 1).clue: It's the most abundant fossil fuel on Earth & at current use may run out in 200-300 years

(4, 1).clue: This alliterative term for a car with low fuel efficiency became common in the 1970s

(4, 2).clue: Found on many sport utility vehicles, it's a system where both axles provide propulsion

(1, 3).clue: "Whenever he gets in a fix, he reaches into his bag of tricks"

(2, 5).clue: Gonzalo Jimenez de Quesada founded Bogota between 2 trips to find this mythical golden city

(3, 5).clue: After escaping from a lab in Massachusetts, this European moth spread & damaged trees in the Northeast

(1, 1).clue: November 3 is the national day to celebrate this, be it tuna fish or peanut butter & jelly

(3, 1).clue: James Garfield died of a gunshot wound in September 1881, as did this president in September 1901

(6, 2).clue: Watch out for the goose type of these; they may grow attached to the hull of your ship
